plays.text: Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Elbowing Ian Laperriere
Penalty to Jaroslav Modry 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Joe Nieuwendyk
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Modano
Penalty to Jaroslav Modry 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brenden Morrow
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Jason Allison
Goal scored by Adam Deadmarsh assisted by Mathieu Schneider and Jaroslav Modry
Penalty to Craig Johnson 2 minutes for Roughing Pat Verbeek
Penalty to Pat Verbeek 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Pat Verbeek 2 minutes for Roughing Craig Johnson served by Pierre Turgeon
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Philippe Boucher 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Modano
Goal scored by Pierre Turgeon assisted by Mike Modano and Jamie Langenbrunner
